1️⃣ **Harness your Social Media** 1️⃣ 

"Module 1 - Harness your Instagram" <:Instagram:1151176235506991154>

**Summary:**
- Choose a niche to get the framework for your content - list 5 topics
- Niche down into sub-niches to make it easier to create content
- Username: easy to remember that represents what you do
- Name: different to username, advertises what the page is about
- Bio: tell your prospective followers what you do and how you can help them with a CTA
- Aesthetic: how your page looks, make it recognizable
- Logo: recognizable, keep the same logo for a while

**Action steps:**
- Setup your Instagram page

What do we recommend to go for in this video?

A Making perfect newsletter
B Making most efficient funnel
C Making the most aesthetic and distinguishable IG-

**Summary:**
- The only tool you need is a video editor if you make videos, for everything else you can use Canva
- In Canva, select Instagram Post - make it user-friendly and concise
- Front slide: to grab attention and let them know what the post is about
- Content slides: where you provide the information
- Final slide: call to action
- Reels: favored by the algorithm and can provide more information and value than regular posts
- Stories: make them engaging and around interesting topics relating to your page
- The best times to post is after lunchtime and dinnertime for your main audience

**Action steps:**
- Create an Instagram Post on Canva
- Create a reel

Did you watch the video?

A Yes

**Summary:**
- To gain high-quality followers, your content must be good
- Organic growth: creating valuable content that people share and comment
- Promotional growth: identify accounts within your niche doing promotions or use PROMOTE
- Giveaways: partner with another brand
- Fans: engage with your fans in the DMs to build up a rapport

**Action steps:**
- Grow your account by posting valuable content

What is a quote used in the video?

A No time to cook big keto meals?-
B No time to workout in the morning?
C No time to cook your meals?

**Summary:**
- Use your account to build authority and then DM prospects
- Info-products: once you make it, there’s no more effort other than marketing - ebooks, audiobooks, courses
- Services: 1 on 1 help for people that don’t want just a product
- Webinars: can charge for entry or free then upsell
- Subscriptions: a subscription service can provide recurring revenue for you
- Affiliates: selling other people’s products and getting a cut from the sale
- Promotions: as your page grows, you can get paid for promotions

**Action steps:**
Decide how you will monetize your page

What is a way to monetize your page mentioned in the video?

A Pamphlets
B E-Books -
C Merch

**Summary:**
- You don’t truly own the page - make sure you follow the community guidelines
- Build a backup page in case something happens to your main
- Move to other platforms such as Twitter, YouTube and an email list
- Make friends with other pages
- Appeal the ban and politely ask to reactivate your account

**Action steps:**
- Create a backup page
- Create accounts on other platforms
- Make friends with other pages

What is a way to survive a potential IG ban mentioned in the video?

A Contact IG and make a very descriptive complaint that they don't know how to run their platform

B Make a back-up page and understand that in this scenario they hold all the power, so be polite when writing your appeal. -

C Call the IG support number and complain to them that it was an unrightful ban.
